channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-36744|2024-08-04T01:01:59.187Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20security%20%28consumer%29
item.description: Trend Micro Security (Consumer) 2021 and 2020 are vulnerable to a directory junction vulnerability which could allow an attacker to exploit the system to escalate privileges and create a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2021-43771|2024-08-04T04:03:08.683Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20antivirus%20for%20mac%202021
item.description: Trend Micro Antivirus for Mac 2021 v11 (Consumer) is vulnerable to an improper access control privilege escalation vulnerability that could allow an attacker to establish a connection that could lead to full local privilege escalation within the application. Please note that an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-42102|2024-08-04T03:22:25.977Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: An uncontrolled search path element vulnerabilities in Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service agents could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-42012|2024-08-04T03:22:25.638Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service and Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-36745|2024-08-04T01:01:59.288Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20serverprotect%20for%20storage
item.description: A vulnerability in Trend Micro ServerProtect for Storage 6.0, ServerProtect for EMC Celerra 5.8, ServerProtect for Network Appliance Filers 5.8, and ServerProtect for Microsoft Windows / Novell Netware 5.8 could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication on affected installations.

item.title: CVE-2021-42108|2024-08-04T03:22:25.952Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: Unnecessary privilege vulnerabilities in the Web Console of Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service and Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-42107|2024-08-04T03:22:25.899Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: Unnecessary privilege vulnerabilities in Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service, Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 and Worry-Free Business Security Services could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability. This vulnerability is similar to but not identical to CVE-2021-42104, 42105 and 42106.

item.title: CVE-2021-42101|2024-08-04T03:22:25.786Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: An uncontrolled search path element vulnerabilities in Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability. This vulnerability is similar but not identical to CVE-2021-42103.

item.title: CVE-2021-42103|2024-08-04T03:22:25.872Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: An uncontrolled search path element vulnerabilities in Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability. This vulnerability is similar but not identical to CVE-2021-42101.

item.title: CVE-2021-36741|2024-08-04T01:01:59.373Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: An improper input validation vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service, OfficeScan XG, and Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 allows a remote attached to upload arbitrary files on affected installations. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to logon to the productï¿½s management console in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-42104|2024-08-04T03:22:25.988Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: Unnecessary privilege vulnerabilities in Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service, Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 and Worry-Free Business Security Services could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability. This vulnerability is similar to but not identical to CVE-2021-42105, 42106 and 42107.

item.title: CVE-2021-42105|2024-08-04T03:22:25.842Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: Unnecessary privilege vulnerabilities in Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service, Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 and Worry-Free Business Security Services could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability. This vulnerability is similar to but not identical to CVE-2021-42104, 42106 and 42107.

item.title: CVE-2021-43772|2024-08-04T04:03:08.811Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20security%202021%20%28consumer%29
item.description: Trend Micro Security 2021 v17.0 (Consumer) contains a vulnerability that allows files inside the protected folder to be modified without any detection.

item.title: CVE-2021-42011|2024-08-04T03:22:25.709Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: An incorrect permission assignment vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service could allow a local attacker to load a DLL with escalated privileges on affected installations. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-42106|2024-08-04T03:22:25.939Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description: Unnecessary privilege vulnerabilities in Trend Micro Apex One, Apex One as a Service, Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 and Worry-Free Business Security Services could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability. This vulnerability is similar to but not identical to CVE-2021-42104, 42105 and 42107.

item.title: CVE-2021-36742|2024-08-04T01:01:59.398Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one

Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
